description: Spacious 2-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom, two-level townhouse in excellent condition! Featuring 2 generously sized upstairs bedrooms. Ideally located in a central area, it offers quick access to shops, restaurants, grocery stores, transit options, & Highway 1 for easy commuting. The home includes a fenced patio w/ private street access, providing additional privacy & outdoor space for relaxing or entertaining. The complex features a lovely inner courtyard, secure underground parking, a bike room, & a storage room. Within walking distance, enjoy McLean Park, James Park Elementary, Save On Foods on Prairie, various dining options, banks, and more. Costco, Canadian Tire, & Walmart are nearby, w/ Terry Fox Secondary just a 3-minute drive away. This property is a must-see! OPEN HOUSE:Oct.19 (Sun) 2-4PM
